docs.snippet: Masahiro Tanaka had another strong outing in a 4-3 Yankees win over the Phillies, despite allowing his first home run....
docs.lead_paragraph: Masahiro Tanaka had another strong outing in a 4-3 Yankees win over the Phillies, despite allowing his first home run.
docs.abstract: New York Yankees beat Philadelphia Phillies, 4-3, with pitcher Masahiro Tanaka taking mound to earn the win.

headline.main: Tanaka Is Praised by Phillies, Even One Who Homered Off Him
headline.print_headline: Tanaka Is Praised by Phillies, Even One Who Homered Off Him

docs.snippet: Bartolo Colon and Jon Niese had mixed results pitching in a simulated outing on Wednesday along with Bobby Parnell....
docs.lead_paragraph: Bartolo Colon and Jon Niese had mixed results pitching in a simulated outing on Wednesday along with Bobby Parnell.
docs.abstract: New York Mets pitchers Bartolo Colon, Jon Niese and Bobby Parnell take turns facing live batters, in a gamelike situation at training camp, with no fans in the stands; all three are working their way back from injuries.

headline.main: The Mets’ Big Game: Four Batters, Three Pitchers
headline.print_headline: The Mets’ Big Game: Four Batters, Three Pitchers

docs.snippet: Dr. Jobe was renowned as the father of Tommy John surgery, a procedure that has been duplicated thousands of times in sports medicine....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Jobe was renowned as the father of Tommy John surgery, a procedure that has been duplicated thousands of times in sports medicine.
docs.abstract: Dr Frank Jobe, orthopedist renowned as the father of Tommy John surgery, a landmark in sports medicine that has saved the careers of numerous athletes, most of them pitchers, dies at age 88; Jobe was honored by the Baseball Hall of Fame at a 2013 ceremony in Cooperstown, NY.

headline.main: Frank Jobe, Surgeon Who Saved Pitchers’ Careers, Dies at 88
headline.print_headline: Dr. Frank Jobe, Who Pioneered Tommy John Surgery, Dies at 88

docs.snippet: Dr. Frank Jobe, who pioneered the 'Tommy John' elbow surgery that has prolonged the careers of athletes in a variety of sports, particularly baseball, has died at the age of 88....
docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Frank Jobe, who pioneered the 'Tommy John' elbow surgery that has prolonged the careers of athletes in a variety of sports, particularly baseball, has died at the age of 88.

headline.main: Pioneering 'Tommy John' Surgeon Jobe Dead at 88
headline.print_headline: Pioneering 'Tommy John' Surgeon Jobe Dead at 88

docs.snippet: Carmen Berra, the wife of New York Yankees great Yogi Berra, has died. She was 85....
docs.lead_paragraph: Carmen Berra, the wife of New York Yankees great Yogi Berra, has died. She was 85.

headline.main: Wife of Longtime Yankee Yogi Berra Dies at 85
headline.print_headline: Wife of Longtime Yankee Yogi Berra Dies at 85

headline.print_headline: Ted Turner Rushed to Clinic in Argentina With Appendicitis: Media

headline.print_headline: Transgender Woman Sues CrossFit Over Competition

docs.snippet: Troy Tulowitzki hit two long home runs and impressed in the field on Friday, leading the Colorado Rockies to a 7-2 victory over a Los Angeles Angels split squad....
docs.lead_paragraph: Troy Tulowitzki hit two long home runs and impressed in the field on Friday, leading the Colorado Rockies to a 7-2 victory over a Los Angeles Angels split squad.

headline.main: Tulowitzki's 2 HRs Power Rockies Past Angels 7-2
headline.print_headline: Tulowitzki's 2 HRs Power Rockies Past Angels 7-2

docs.snippet: Edwin Jackson allowed three runs and four hits in three innings for the Cubs while Carlos Carrasco struck out six of his 12 batters in leading the Cleveland Indians over a Chicago split-squad 7-2 Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Edwin Jackson allowed three runs and four hits in three innings for the Cubs while Carlos Carrasco struck out six of his 12 batters in leading the Cleveland Indians over a Chicago split-squad 7-2 Friday.

headline.main: Carrasco Strikes Out 6, Indians Beat Cubs 7-2
headline.print_headline: Carrasco Strikes Out 6, Indians Beat Cubs 7-2
